main.name: Ted Peters
main.bio: I am a animal loving, creative. Currently living in Austin Texas, but I have moved around the United States quite a bit. Whenever I need a breathe of fresh air or to get out of my head I like to go hiking, skateboarding, painting, or if I can cook a nice meal for friends and family I would choose that above all else.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me for anything please do so here. If you prefer to talk by phone just include your info in your message and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skills, I want to be clear with who is reading this right now. I have years of experience in kitchens filling complicated roles on the line. Because of the pandemic the restaurant industry has taken a serious dive and I found myself unsure of what to do next. Mid 2020, over the summer I decided that because I love computers and proplem solving that I would commit to learning full stack web development. I had experience with building some functions and command line interfaces with python or javascript and node.js. Now I have a more broad skillset, having been exposed and worked with languages like HTML5, CSS, SCSS, XML, ReactJS, NodeJS, JQuery, Javascript, MySQL, MongoDB, and I some experience with Swift.

education.description: I left after 4 semesters with only a few more classes to finish, but with no clear vision of what I wanted to do I moved from CT to Maine to explore culinary options. I started Cooking to support myself around this time.

It was a good experience. I actually found that I really enjoy philosophy while sutdying here. The problem was I couldn't support myself and pay for school on a little more than minimum wage at that time.
